title: Chambang
text:
Chambang is an administrative sub-unit of <a href="Kra%20Daadi%20district">Kra Daadi district</a> in the state of <a href="Arunachal%20Pradesh">Arunachal Pradesh</a>. Also it is one of the administrative sub-unit comprising the 18-<a href="Palin%2C%20Arunachal%20Pradesh">Palin</a> <a href="legislative%20assembly">assembly</a> <a href="Electoral%20district">constituency</a>.
Connectivity.
Chambang is accessible by two motorways, with two more in progress. One of the operational road is from <a href="New%20Palin">New Palin</a> via Dari whose foundation stone was laid by the then <a href="Arunachal%20Pradesh">Arunachal Pradesh</a> <a href="chief%20minister">Chief Minister</a> <a href="Dorjee%20Khandu">Dorjee Khandu</a> in Chambang in 2007 and other one from <a href="New%20Palin">New Palin</a> via <a href="Pania">Pania</a>. The town has a helipad used only in rare circumstance.
